Inspired by [@Molly White](https://www.mollywhite.net/verify/) and [@Rob Knight](https://rknight.me/verify) this page serves as verification of my various accounts.

# domains / email

I personally own and control this domain ([dunkirk.sh](https://dunkirk.sh)) as well as [kieranklukas.com](https://kieranklukas.com) and maintain email addresses on both domains. I also just got [serif.blue](https://serif.blue) which I'm super excited about!

If you want to contact me, via email to `me@dunkirk.sh` or `me@kieranklukas.com` are both good places to find me. I also send email from `kieran@hackclub.com`, `kieran@purplebubble.org`, and ~`kieran@purplebubble.org`~.
